title: When and where is ChaiPi available?
description: ChaiPi is available in Pune in selected areas from 08:00 am to 01:00 am, seven days a week.
Simply open the app to see the tea shops in your area or head to our website, to see a map of the coverage area.
We're working on expanding to new areas in Pune and new cities in India - so keep an eye out for updates on.
